施す: (ほどこす) - to give (time, money, goods)/to donate; to do/to perform/to conduct; to apply (processing, makeup, etc.)/to add (e.g. ornamentation, annotation); to sow/to seed/to scatter (e.g. fertilizer)/to sprinkle; to spread far and wide
施主: (せしゅ) - donor/benefactor/almsgiver; chief mourner; client (of a builder, etc.)
施入: (せにゅう) - giving something as alms or dispensation; alms
施工: (しこう) - construction; constructing; carrying out; work; formation; workmanship; execution
施政方針演説: (しせいほうしんえんぜつ) - policy speech
施条: (しじょう) - rifling a gun barrel; making lines
施療: (せりょう) - free medical treatment; gratuitous treatment
施米: (せまい) - rice given in charity; donating rice
施行: (しぎょう) - (しこう, せこう, しぎょう only) execution/enforcing/carrying out; (せぎょう only) giving alms/giving food to the poor or monks
施行規則: (しこうきそく) - enforcement regulations; misterial ordinance; regulations relative to the application of a law
施設庁: (しせつちょう) - facilities administration organization (defence, etc.)
施設栽培: (しせつさいばい) - intensive cultivation; greenhouse farming
施餓鬼: (せがき) - service for the benefit of suffering spirits
旁: (ぼう) - Rhs de caractere, radical da mão direita de um caractere
旁々: (かたがた) - incidentally; at the same time
旁旁: (かたがた) - incidentally; at the same time
旁点: (ぼうてん) - marks or dots used to emphasize text passage (emphasise); marks to facilitate reading of kanbun
旁註: (ぼうちゅう) - marginal notes; side notes; gloss
旅する: (たびする) - to travel; to take a trip
旅の恥はかき捨て: (たびのはじはかきすて) - Once over the border, one may do anything
旅の恥は掻き捨て: (たびのはじはかきすて) - Once over the border, one may do anything
旅の空: (たびのそら) - away from home; while travelling
旅は心世は情け: (たびはこころよはなさけ) - In traveling, companionship; in life, kindness
旅は道連れ世は情け: (たびはみちづれよはなさけ) - just as it is reassuring to have a companion when traveling, it is important for us to care for each other as we pass through this life
旅人の木: (タビビトノキ) - traveller's tree (Ravenala madagascariensis); traveller's palm
旅人木: (りょじんぼく) - traveller's tree (Ravenala madagascariensis); traveller's palm
旅住い: (たびずまい) - place one stays when traveling (travelling)
旅信: (たびだより) - message from someone on a journey
旅僧: (たびそう) - traveling priest; travelling priest
旅先: (たびさき) - destination; goal (of travel); place one stays during a journey
旅商い: (たびあきない) - peddling; peddler; pedlar
旅客列車: (りょきゃくれっしゃ) - passenger train
旅宿: (たびやど) - travellers' inn; stage inn
旅寝: (たびね) - sleeping away from home; overnight stay when traveling
旅役者: (たびやくしゃ) - itinerant entertainer or troupe
旅情: (りょじょう) - one's mood while traveling (travelling)
旅愁: (りょしゅう) - loneliness on a journey
旅慣れる: (たびなれる) - to be accustomed to traveling (travelling)
旅所: (たびしょ) - place where the sacred palanquin is lodged during a festival
旅支度: (たびじたく) - preparations for a journey
旅枕: (たびまくら) - sleeping away from home
旅稼ぎ: (たびかせぎ) - working away from home
旅立ち: (たびだち) - setting off (on a trip)
旅立つ: (たびだつ) - to begin a trip/to depart/to embark; to die/to pass away/to depart this life
旅籠: (はたご) - inn (originally a basket of woven bamboo in which travellers carried food) (travelers)
旅行代理店: (りょこうだいりてん) - travel agent
旅行会社: (りょこうがいしゃ) - travel agent; travel agency
旅行券: (りょこうけん) - travel voucher; travel coupon
旅行小切手: (りょこうこぎって) - traveler's check; traveller's cheque
旅行文書: (りょこうぶんしょ) - travel document
旅行案内書: (りょこうあんないしょ) - travel guide; guidebook (for travellers)
旅行業法: (りょこうぎょうほう) - {law} Travel Agency Act
旅行業者: (りょこうぎょうしゃ) - travel agent
旅行業者代理業: (りょこうぎょうしゃだいりぎょう) - {law} travel agent; reseller (of tour packages, etc.)
旅行疲れ: (りょこうずかれ) - fatigue from traveling (travelling)
旅行社: (りょこうしゃ) - travel agent; travel agency
旅行者下痢: (りょこうしゃげり) - traveler's diarrhea; traveller's diarrhoea
旅行者用小切手: (りょこうしゃようこぎって) - traveler's check; traveller's cheque
旅行計画: (りょこうけいかく) - travel planning; travel plans
